title: Construct-Moving Image
description: Provides the student with the conceptual, formal, aesthetic, and technical approaches to reconsider film, videos, and animation within the context of emerging digital forms.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2720 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
